LanguageData.MoonshineMash_Westerado.label: moonshine mash
LanguageData.MoonshineMash_Westerado.description: Mash made from corn and rye. This substance needs to be distilled in a distillery before it becomes drinkable Moonshine.
LanguageData.RyeMash_Westererado.label: rye mash
LanguageData.RyeMash_Westererado.description: Milled, soaked, and cooked rye. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable Rye whiskey.
LanguageData.SchnappsMash_Westerado.label: undistilled schnapps
LanguageData.SchnappsMash_Westerado.description: Mash made from potatoes. This substance needs to be distilled in a distillery before it becomes drinkable Schnapps.
